title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 438.8 - Regional Training Program and Residential Training Program course allocation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 438.8 - Regional Training Program and Residential Training Program course allocation

State Regulations

Training course allocation for delivery by the Office of Fire

Prevention and Control, or their designated representatives, in addition to
those delivered in the Outreach Training Program shall be based on: (a) availability of instructors to deliver
the requested courses; (b) demonstrated need for training courses; and
(c) funding available in the State budget for
that fiscal year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
438.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
